languages.text: {n}Дознаватель косится на вас и разочарованно вздыхает. Спустя несколько секунд тишины вы понимаете, что ответа можно не ждать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель косится на вас и вздыхает с таким видом, словно вы задали очень наивный вопрос. Спустя несколько секунд тишины вы понимаете, что ответа можно не ждать.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realise that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель косится на вас и разочарованно вздыхает. Спустя несколько секунд тишины вы понимаете, что ответа можно не ждать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realize that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realize that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realize that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realise that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希眯起眼睛看着你，发出了一声失望的叹息。几秒钟的沉默过后，你意识到他并不打算回答这个问题。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realise that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希眯起眼睛看着你，发出了一声失望的叹息。几秒钟的沉默过后，你意识到他并不打算回答这个问题。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}El interrogador entrecierra los ojos y suspira, decepcionado. Tras unos segundos de silencio, comprendes que no tiene intención de contestar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realise that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador entrecierra los ojos y suspira, decepcionado. Tras unos segundos de silencio, comprendes que no tiene intención de contestar.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは目を細め、がっかりしたようにため息をつく。数秒の沈黙の後、あなたは答えが返ってこないことに気づいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realise that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは目を細め、がっかりしたようにため息をつく。数秒の沈黙の後、あなたは答えが返ってこないことに気づいた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator blickt dich stirnrunzelnd an und seufzt enttäuscht. Nach einigen Sekunden des Schweigens wird dir klar, dass du keine Antwort erhalten wirst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realise that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator blickt dich stirnrunzelnd an und seufzt enttäuscht. Nach einigen Sekunden des Schweigens wird dir klar, dass du keine Antwort erhalten wirst.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur plisse les yeux et laisse échapper un soupir de déception. Après plusieurs secondes de silence, vous comprenez qu'il ne vous répondra pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realise that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur plisse les yeux et laisse échapper un soupir de déception. Après plusieurs secondes de silence, vous comprenez qu'il ne vous répondra pas.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, gözlerini kısıyor. Düş kırıklığına uğramışçasına nefes veriyor. Birkaç saniyelik sessizliğin ardından cevap vermeyeceğini anlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator narrows his eyes at you and releases a disappointed sigh. After several seconds of silence, you realise that you will not be getting an answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, gözlerini kısıyor. Düş kırıklığına uğramışçasına nefes veriyor. Birkaç saniyelik sessizliğin ardından anlıyorsun ki cevap vermeyecek.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
